page.title: 08PUBLIC SERVICES IN LANGHOLM
page.content: THE REGISTRAR FOR BIRTHS,DEATHS AND CIVIL MARRIAGES IS AT THE {TOWN HALL.} THIS IS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICE.COUNCIL HOUSE TENANTS PAY THEIR RENT HERE.IT IS THE INFORMATION CENTRE,ALONG WITH THE LIBRARY,FOR THE TOWN.WE HAVE ONE {HEALTH CENTRE} WITH TWO MALE FULL_TIME DOCTORS,ONE PART_TIME LADY DOCTOR,TWO DISTRICT NURSES,AND ONE HEALTH VISITOR.IN MARCH 1985 , 959 PATIENTS CONSULTED A DOCTOR.THERE WERE 447 HOME VISITS.10 CLINICS ARE HELD BY SPECIALISTS FROM DUMFRIES.WE HAVE ONE{POLICE STATION, FIVE FULL_TIME MEN AND 8 PART_TIME. THERE ARE TWO CELLS RARELY USED. 128 INCIDENTS WERE REPORTED LAST YEAR. THE {FIREMEN}WORK PART_TIME.THERE ARE 10 OF THEM AND 1 ENGINE.THEY GET 35_40 CALLS A YEAR.THE CHIEF FIREMAN WORKS AT THE 'SKINYARDS'.
